about_the_game:
Zombie Soldier is a simple yet challenging throwback to the early console days of gaming. Please expect 'Zombie Soldier' to be a small, re-playable, metroidvania style throwback to the early days of Nintendo and Sega Genesis/Megadrive 16Bit style games.

1. Easy to learn classic A+B button controls.

2. Play with Gamepad or Keyboard + Mouse.

3. Controller support for that retro gameplay feel.

4. A retro and modern graphics mashup.

5. Simple yet challenging arcade and 80's home console throwback styled game.

Kill or be killed and fight hard to pass each challenging level. Different paths can be taken and the levels get harder as you progress. Shoot, jump and kill to survive while collecting blood viles to escape permadeath in each level.
detailed_description:
LORAG GAMES NEW GAME FREEDOM IS OUT NOW ON STEAM



Become the apex predator of the avian world. Ensure your eaglet's survival by hunting and killing your prey to return food to the eyrie. Collect FREEDOM™ stars and fly massive cave systems to progress to deadlier environments.

short_description: Face off as the Zombie Soldier against the undead army. Explore graveyards and army bases to eradicate them all. Shoot, jump and destroy in this simple retro styled 2.5D metroidvania throwback game. A casual yet challenging introduction to the Zombie Soldier world.
